page.title: 13Good Health in Silverdale
page.content: Silverdale Health Centre is close to the shops.It is open every weekday morning and every evening except Thursday.At weekends it is closed,but there is a relief doctor if you are desperate for attention. The five doctors cope with common ailments such as coughs and colds.If the illness is more serious the patient is sent to a specialist doctor at the North Staffs Royal Infirmary. The Health visitor has her office at the centre.She attends to mothers with young babies or she might visit old people to give them baths or help them to fill in forms. There is a chiropodist who attends to corns and bunions on one day a week.An antenatal clinic is open every Tuesday. The babies are examined and weighed.Mums can buy cheap baby food and vitamins.
